SEARCH
Package org.filestack

Class Policy

java.lang.Object
org.filestack.Policy
public class Policy extends Object
Determines what access a user is allowed (if account security is enabled). A policy sets access and a signature validates the policy. This class should only be used in server-side code. Do not include your app secret in client-side code.
See Also:
  • Filestack Docs - Creating policies
